enhancedcombathud.controls.toggle.title: Toggle Argon Combat HUD
enhancedcombathud.controls.toggle.warnin: Argon Combat HUD: No token selected. Please select a token to enable the HUD
enhancedcombathud.settings.color.label: Color
enhancedcombathud.settings.color.hint: Color of the actions tab and other main features of the HUD
enhancedcombathud.settings.color-bonus-a: Color of the bonus action tab
enhancedcombathud.settings.color-free-ac: Color of the free action tab
enhancedcombathud.settings.color-end-tur: Color of the end turn tab
enhancedcombathud.settings.color-tooltip: Color of the tooltips and save/skills/tools popup
enhancedcombathud.settings.theme.name: Theme
enhancedcombathud.settings.scale.name: Scale
enhancedcombathud.settings.scale.hint: HUD Scale - if autoscale is enabled this setting will be used as a multiplier on top of the calculated scale
enhancedcombathud.settings.noAutoscale.h: Don't scale the HUD to fit the screen, use the flat value in the Scale setting instead
enhancedcombathud.settings.alwaysOn.name: Always On
enhancedcombathud.settings.alwaysOn.hint: Automatically show the hud whenever you select a token
enhancedcombathud.settings.leftPos.name: Left Position
enhancedcombathud.settings.leftPos.hint: Distance from the left border in pixels
enhancedcombathud.settings.botPos.name: Bottom Position
enhancedcombathud.settings.botPos.hint: Distance from the bottom border in pixels
enhancedcombathud.settings.playerDetails: Positions players name and class information at bottom for portrait
enhancedcombathud.settings.showTooltipsS: Show tooltips on hover for special actions (dodge,disengage,shove...)
enhancedcombathud.settings.showTooltipsA: Show tooltips on hover for abilities in the ability menu
Show tooltips on hover for skills in the ability menu
Show tooltips on hover for tools in the ability menu
enhancedcombathud.settings.fadeOutInacti: Fade out the HUD after not mouse overing it for 5 seconds
Delay before fading out the HUD in seconds
enhancedcombathud.settings.fadeoutOpacit: Opacity of the HUD when faded out
enhancedcombathud.settings.hideMacroPlay: Hide Macro Bar and Player list
Hide Macro Bar and Player list while the HUD is opened
enhancedcombathud.settings.openCombatSta: Open the HUD when a combat is started
enhancedcombathud.settings.switchEquip.h: Automatically equip/unequip items when switching sets
enhancedcombathud.settings.showWeaponsIt: Show weapons in the 'Use Item' section. Usefull if your weapon slots are not enough
enhancedcombathud.settings.noAA.name: Don't Apply Active Effects
enhancedcombathud.settings.noAA.hint: Don't apply active effects when using special actions. (requires refresh)
enhancedcombathud.settings.rangefinder.h: Enable 3D Canvas Range Finder when hovering items in the HUD. When enabled will show the distance to the target - the distance will be Red if the target is out of range.
enhancedcombathud.settings.rangepicker.h: When using an item or action that requires a target, this will show a target count that follows the mouse cursor until the correct amount of target is selected, use the +/- keys to manually adjust the required targets if needed.
enhancedcombathud.settings.rangepickercl: When using an item or action that requires a target, clear all targets before entering Target Picker mode.
enhancedcombathud.tooltip.target.name: Target
enhancedcombathud.tooltip.range.name: Range
enhancedcombathud.settings.thememenu.hin: Configure, choose and cusomize Argon themes
enhancedcombathud.themeOptions.autoTextC: Autoset Text Colors Based off Background
This setting adjust the text color based on the background color to a color that should be legiable.
enhancedcombathud.themeOptions.themeHint: Selecting a theme will apply a predefined color pallet to Argon.
enhancedcombathud.themeOptions.portraitB: Background/Foreground/Border Colors when Mouse isn't over Element
